text: Dapchi is a town in north-east Nigeria some 75 kilometres south of the border with Niger. ==History== In February 2018, 110 girls were reported to have been kidnapped from the Government Science and Technical College in Dapchi by Boko Haram insurgents. On 21 March, 2018, 101 of the schoolgirls were dropped back to the town. ==References== Category:Populated places in Yobe State
title: Dapchi
